name: Swords of Valor Custom Plugins
body:
### Welcome to the Swords of Valor custom plugins website.
Here, our plugin developer team will post our plugins, which will be available for download for developers wishing to look at our code, server admins looking for some new plugins, and just anyone who wants an easy kick-start to help develop an RPG based plugin for the bukkit platform.

### Our Server
Our server, which will soon be going into beta, is currently in the early stages of development. If you would like to help build, write lore, or develop plugins, please go to our [website](http://www.swordsofvalor.enjin.com/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
